DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy safety T4020 versus vehicle .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Assessment T4020 Versus Vehicule Patients With Chronic Neurotrophic Keratitis Corneal Ulcer
DOC.criteria: Adult patient diagnose one chronic keratitis/corneal ulcer Patients sign date informed consent Patient 18 year Patient perforate corneal ulcer OR risk immediate perforation corneal ulcer .
